page.title: 07CHILDREN IN UNIFORM
page.content: In St Philip's School there are 108 Brownies,Guides etc. At Guides we're put into patrols and we usually do things together.We do things like go on camp and cook dinner over a fire.Brownies,Cubs and Scouts usually do the same sort of things.We do badges but they get harder as we get older. 13 different packs are used by children at St Philip's School:_ {TWERTON 2 OLDFIELD 1 {CULVERHAY 2 6TH ST LUKES 7 {ST PHILIP'S 24 MANVER STREET 1 {BEECHEN CLIFF 16 ST BARNABUS 4 {24TH BATH 22 21ST ASCENSION 4 {1ST ST LUKES 10 COMBE DOWN 7 {SOUTHDOWN METHODIST 8.} To start Brownies you have to be 7, Guides 10, Cubs 8 and Scouts 11 or 12. { { {
